TopicTitle: Launch a Test Rocket: Crashing after you completing flight goals forces restart

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: windows 10 | CPU: Intel i5 4690K | GPU: NVIDEA GTX 1070 | RAM: 16gb

 

In Launch a Test Rocket, crashing after you have already completed the flight goals forces you to restart. Even though you have already completed the tutorial goals, it takes away the option to continue and forces the 'replay' or 'end tutorial' options.
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/625661934762721303/1150000540332335134/Kerbal_Space_Program_2_2023-09-09_10-23-53.mp4 

 

Edited September 9, 2023 by Anth12
